page.title: 16WHERE I LIVE IN TIBSHELF
page.content: I live on a small estate called Spa Croft. It is near my school and near the recreation ground. It is a three- bedroomed semi-detached with a garage and two sheds. Why we need two sheds I don't know. There is a bigger estate nearby where I sometimes go to play with my friends. When we go shopping we go to one of the main towns nearby, like Alfreton, Chesterfield or Sutton-in-Ashfield. There is also some attractive country- side nearby, like Ashover where we sometimes go for a picnic. I like shooting but there are no places where I can practise except my back yard. I also like cycling. I keep my bike in one of the sheds. It is a red 10-speed Peugeot racer. I have just passed my cycling proficiency test at school. by Connan (11)
